name: Triple Button Minigames
description:
Extention of the project B🎳wling

Triple Button Minigames is made with GB Studio 2.0 beta version.

B🎳wling :
Be a pin placer master so the bowling ball can strike all the pins ! But be careful with the timing.

Ghost Slicer :
Incarn Musashi and try to slice ghost as much as you can ! Be careful, they speed up with time.

Big Date A :
Like robots profiles you have, and report all the humans who are in your robot date application !

Z : (A Button) Place pin, Slice Ghost, Like a robot, pass dialogue
X : (B Button) Reset gauge, Report a human.
Enter : (Start) Pass the training

Credits to krümel and Deer Tears for the free sound assets.
